summary: A command‑line script that fine‑tunes a Stable Diffusion model using Direct Preference Optimization (DDPO). It integrates an aesthetic scoring model and a configurable MLP to evaluate generated images, manages training hyper‑parameters, and logs metrics to Weights & Biases.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑run pipeline for companies to improve the visual quality and human appeal of AI‑generated images, enabling more marketable and user‑satisfying content for creative and commercial applications.
